Introduction.Title: Introduction to Python in Telugu
Content: Python anedhi high-level, interpreted, and general-purpose programming language. Alage idi simple ga untadi and easy ga ardham ayye programming language and readability ki famous.
Ee language ni Guido van Rossum 1991 lo create chesaru. Python lo procedural, object-oriented, functional programming methods anni use cheyyachu.
Python ni websites, AI, automation, scientific research laanti vishayalaku vadataru. Chala mandi developers ki idi favorite language!
Memory management automatic ga untundi, syntax flexible ga untundi kabatti beginners ki mariyu advanced developers ki idi best choice.
Python code ni Windows, macOS, Linux lo easy ga run cheyyachu. Live testing ki REPL (Read-Eval-Print Loop) valla debugging kuda chala easy.

Popular.Title: Why Python is Popular?
Content: Django, Flask laanti frameworks valla web development fast avuthadi. AI and Machine Learning kosam TensorFlow, PyTorch laanti tools untayi.
Python automation lo baaga use chestharu. Web scraping, testing, scripting tasks chala easy avuthayi. Simple syntax valla code maintainability kuda baaguntadi.
Google, Facebook, Netflix, NASA laanti pedda companies Python ni valla applications kosam vadutunnayi. Industry lo idi chala reliable and efficient language.
Python ni C, C++, Java laanti languages tho integrate cheyyachu. Data visualization kosam Matplotlib, Seaborn, Plotly laanti libraries use chestaru.
Python lo chala libraries and frameworks unnayi, so idi small scripts nundi pedda enterprise applications varaku perfect ga work chestadi.

Installation.Title: Installation of Python
Content: Python ni Windows, macOS, Linux lo easy ga install cheyyachu.
Windows lo install cheyyali ante:
1. Python official website nunchi latest version download cheyyandi: https://www.python.org/downloads/
2. Installer open chesi, 'Add Python to PATH' option select cheyyandi.
3. Install ayyaka, Command Prompt open chesi `python --version` type cheyyandi, install ayindho ledo telusukovachu.
macOS lo install cheyyali ante:
1. macOS lo already Python untundi, but latest version kosam official site nunchi download cheyyandi: https://www.python.org/downloads/
2. Installer ni open chesi step-by-step follow avandi.
3. Terminal lo `python3 --version` type cheyyandi installation check cheyyataniki.
Linux lo install cheyyali ante:
1. Chala Linux distributions lo Python already untundi, but latest version install cheyyali ante package manager use cheyyandi.
2. Ubuntu users `sudo apt update` taravata `sudo apt install python3` type cheyyandi.
3. Terminal lo `python3 --version` type chesi installation verify cheyyandi.
